Race.SpecificTitle: PW Sales Tax Renewal -- 1/2% S&U - PJ
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana ("the Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a permanent tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax") commencing May 1, 2015, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish (an estimated $1,430,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year), with the avails or proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purpose of constructing, acquiring, maintaining, improving and operating a solid waste collection and disposal system for the Parish, including the closing of existing landfills?

Race.SummaryText:
Village of Bonita Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent (6%) alcohol by volume be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in the Village of Bonita, State of Louisiana?

Race.SummaryText:
Village of Bonita Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent (6%) alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Village of Bonita, State of Louisiana?

Race.SummaryText:
Village of Bonita Propositions
Proposition No. 3
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverage alcohol containing one-half of one percent (1/2%) alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Village of Bonita, State of Louisiana?

Race.SummaryText:
Village of Bonita Propositions
Proposition No. 4
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent (1/2%) alcohol by volume and above by the package only and not for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Village of Bonita, State of Louisiana?

Race.SummaryText:
Village of Bonita Propositions
Proposition No. 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of high and low alcoholic content be permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit, as defined by law, in the Village of Bonita, State of Louisiana?
